title: System Configuration
edit_page_description: Manage system-wide configuration settings organized by category
dev_environment_images_description: Configure available Docker images and their corresponding environment types
git_proxy_enabled_desc: Whether to enable HTTP proxy for Git operations
git_proxy_http_desc: Proxy server URL for Git HTTP operations
git_proxy_https_desc: Proxy server URL for Git HTTPS operations
git_proxy_no_proxy_desc: Comma-separated list of domains to bypass proxy

categoryDescriptions.git: Configure Git proxy and network settings
